title: Jack of Shadows
description: He awoke - if it could be called waking - in the Dung Pits of Glyve. He was naked, on a mound of offal in the middle of a vile, polluted lake, and when he recalled how he came to be there he swore vengeance on his enemies...Through a world half of light, half of darkness, he carried his vendetta, through realms peopled by monsters, witches, vampires, until finally he came to a place where he could destroy his arch-enemy - the Lord of the Bats...
author: Roger Zelazny
